title: This is how the mega-rich shop
text:
Polishing up the Rolls Royce. Source: News Corp Australia 
WOULD you like to go on the world’s most exclusive shopping holiday? 
The Bespoke-Your-Life Tour will set you back a cool $707,368 per couple. 
The dream trip, offered by VeryFirstTo.com, a website specialising in bespoke experiences, enables a couple to experience “the most spectacular custom made items throughout Europe”. 
The tour, which starts and ends in London, includes visits to eight cities, including Milan, Rome, Geneva, Brussels and Paris, where guests will go to Givenchy to work with designers at the famous atelier to create a one-off gown. Kim Kardashian has probably enjoyed bespoke Givenchy. Source: Getty Images 
Also in Paris the couple will create their own set of luggage at Longchamp and meet with a top perfumer to create his and her scents at Parfum sur Mesure. 
In Geneva, the guests will visit the world’s oldest manufacturer of fine watches, Vacheron Constantin to work with the master ateliers to create two bespoke watches. 
The couple will get to take home a pair of shoes made especially for them at Marini Calzature, which has made shoes for Queen Elizabeth of England, Sheikh Al Nahayan of UAE and King Hassan II of Morocco. 
In Milan the love birds will visit Italian suit makers Brioni, a tailor who worked with Daniel Craig to create the suit he wore in Casino Royale . Daniel Craig looking sauve as James Bond in the film Casino Royale Source: News Limited 
Also on the 18-night itinerary is a stop in Amsterdam, where they’ll go to Meesterknecht to design and create their bespoke bicycles. 
Besides clothes, bikes and perfume, the lucky pair will also take home a doll’s house replica of their own home, a makeup kit that complements their skin tone, a bespoke mascot for the car modelled on the guests’ dog, and a specially crafted coat of arms that feature on his and her cufflinks and buttons. 
The $700,000 per couple price tag includes travel, a chauffeur driven luxury saloon car, and accommodation at some of the world’s best hotels, including the Four Seasons Hotel George V in Paris, Hotel De L’Europe in Amsterdam and The Savoy in London.
